DESCRIPTION: Set the permissions to using a command on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setpermission allcommands on** ~ Enables all commands on the server and resets all exceptions.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}setpermission allcommands off** ~ Disables all comands on the server and resets all exceptions.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}setpermission allcommands on [#Channels | Roles]** ~ Enable all commands in these channels or for users with this role.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: NOTE: You can replace the `allcommands` with any command name to specifically target that command.
ALREADY_ENABLED_ALL_COMMANDS: All commands are already enabled on this server.
ALREADY_DISABLED_ALL_COMMANDS: All commands are already disabled on this server.
ALREADY_ENABLED_COMMAND: The command is already enabled on this server.
ALREADY_DISABLED_COMMAND: The command is already disabled on this server.
ENABLED_ALL_COMMANDS: All commands are now enabled on this server.
DISABLED_ALL_COMMANDS: All commands are now disabled on this server.
COMMAND_UPDATED: The command permissions have been updated on this server.
NO_CHANNELS_ROLES: There was no valid channel or role id found.
